title: ∙ Do you (United States) Are you wearing a "Kill All" T-shirt to the GOP event?
subtitle: The Director of Communications of the Colorado Republican Party told Snoops that the saying is well known for being linked to the U.S. Marines.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Ken Pak, a Republican from Colorado, attended an election campaign rally with a shirt on it: Kill them all. "Let God classify "M"
